name: Winter school bus simulator - snow bus parking 3D
name_original: Winter school bus simulator - snow bus parking 3D
description:
Listen!!! You people are interested in driving the school buses in heavy snow falling? If you are interested and excited: Then Snow School bus driving simulator is a game energetic drivers like you who want to drive long vehicles in busy roads of big city over the snow. Apart from game and fun: snow school bus driving game stimulates you to help the children and makes you a civilized citizen. Children are very eager for going to school in snow falling: so in snow School bus driving simulator game you have to go around the big modern city for picking up the kids from different locations standing on the bus stops and freezing due to snow falling. When you reach at spotted location on the map then you have to park the bus exactly in the given parking area to pick the children. You have to follow the all traffic guidelines; this good rehearsal will make a you respectable citizen in real life too.
You can notify the road traffic by pressing horn key when you are driving fast. Use indicators while taking the turns so that buses, cars and other vehicles are warned and can safely drive on the busy roads of big city environment where snow is falling. The city traffic and heavy snow falling may cause you to get late for school but be quick, drive fast but keep the safety of the kids in mind. No need to violate traffic rules while driving your school bus on snow covered roads. Bus driving and parking games are loved by kids but driving a school bus is a very responsible task. Don’t go off road or you might get caught in an accident due to slippery roads. School bus driving simulator is perfect driving simulation to play and have hours of fun. Explore the snowy environment, take kids around the city but don’t be late for home and school.
Features of School bus driving 3D simulator
• Astonishing School Bus Driving Understanding
• Genuine City traffic
• Smooth controls and amusing gameplay
• Explore the Big City snowy Environment
• Pick and Drop School Kids
• A Unique Concept for School Going Kids
• Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
• Play as a Virtual Bus Driver
• Drive different types of school buses


Playing school bus driving academy will let you enjoy the thrill of going to school because a long winter vacation is approaching a head and you will miss your school. So download it now and enjoy the driving and parking thrill of gigantic school buses…..
